reviews.text: Great hotel, lovely accomodation & very peaceful. However, we felt it was let down by the quality & variety of food in the restaurant. We were there for 11 days & there was not enough choice if we had chosen to eat there every night. Two places to eat in Valldemossa village are "Costa Nord" for lunch (& dinner when they are open) & a MUST is dinner at "Ses Espigues", just for the experience. This place has so much clutter it's amazing & service is very friendly & foods OK too.
